task.title: Export Results as CSV
task.shortdesc: Create a CSV file from Result Sets generated in a Query.

taskbody.context: From the Query Project window with a Query Tab open:

step.cmd: Click the Report button at the top of the numbered Query Tab.
Choose Export results as CSV and click Next.
step.stepresult: The Report Wizard will prompt you to specify options for your CSV report.

step.cmd: Enter a Save location by clicking the Browse button to the right of the Save location field, locating an appropriate directory, and clicking Choose.

Choose whether to Export all searches to single file. This allows you to include the results from separate sessions in the same file. Then, choose the sessions whose search results you would like to export and click Next.
step.stepresult: The Report Wizard will prompt you to setup the columns for your CSV export.

step.cmd: To reorder tiers, select the column you would like to re-order and use the up/down arrows to rearrange it. To add a column, type its name in the provided field following instructions in the Report Wizard window and click Add column/+. To remove an unneccessary column from the export, select the column name and click Remove column/-. To choose the default column arrangement, click the Reset to default button at the bottom right corner of the Report Wizard. When you are satisfied with your column settings, click Next.
step.stepresult: Your report(s) will be generated in the specified save location.

step.cmd: To open your report, click its name in the Report Wizard. Otherwise, click Close to close the Report Wizard.
